name: hunter, hunted
description:
There is cruelty in every gaze when it comes down to it, the only thing that matters is where that gaze is directed. Is purity of soul something so valuable it is unconsumable? Play as a wolf belonging to the old world. Will the new world devour, or will the old world remain? In the end, the choice is dependent on your desires.

Official cover image to be uploaded in a later update. Please leave a comment with any thoughts and critiques if you can! Enjoy!
